__e: You saved me from that barn, and now you're here, so that makes you. Pretty damn special, too.
Between you and my sister, and the barn guy and that girl in the restaurant, we have 5, and obviously we need an even 6 for ultimate game play.
Only one person ever goes to the barn, and it comes for her.
Probably from all the salt water in the air. But it... But it reminded me of my grandfather's barn.
She never told me so... not even after what happened between us one night... in Anglade's barn.

That is why she ought to be a bit more grateful, a bit more courteous, and why, ten years on, it's no hardship to me to put a little distance between me and her, and if I never have reason to set foot in that barn again...
